81  static inline timeStamp getCurrentTimeStamp() {
82  timeStamp current_ts = 0ULL;
83  timeStamp NSEC_PER_SEC = 1000000000ULL;
84 
85 #ifdef _WIN32
86  LARGE_INTEGER freq;
87  QueryPerformanceFrequency(&freq);
88  LARGE_INTEGER start;
89  QueryPerformanceCounter(&start);
90  current_ts = ((timeStamp) start.QuadPart * NSEC_PER_SEC / (timeStamp) freq.QuadPart);
91 #else
92  struct timespec now = {0};
93 
94  if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &now) != 0) {
95  current_ts = 0;
96  } else
97  current_ts = ((uint64_t) now.tv_sec * NSEC_PER_SEC + (uint64_t) now.tv_nsec);
98 #endif
99  return current_ts;
100  }
101 
106  struct Resolution {
107  size_t width;
108  size_t height;
110  Resolution(size_t w_ = 0, size_t h_ = 0) {
111  width = w_;
112  height = h_;
113  }
114 
119  size_t area() {
120  return width * height;
121  }
122 
127  bool operator==(const Resolution &that)const {
128  return ((width == that.width) && (height == that.height));
129  }
130 
135  bool operator!=(const Resolution &that)const {
136  return ((width != that.width) || (height != that.height));
137  }
138  };

148  struct CameraParameters {
149  float fx;
150  float fy;
151  float cx;
152  float cy;
153  double disto[5];
154  float v_fov;
155  float h_fov;
156  float d_fov;
157  Resolution image_size;
166  void SetUp(float focal_x, float focal_y, float center_x, float center_y) {
167  fx = focal_x;
168  fy = focal_y;
169  cx = center_x;
170  cy = center_y;
171  }
172  };

204  enum MEM {
205  MEM_CPU = 1,
206  MEM_GPU = 2
207  };
208 
210  inline MEM operator|(MEM a, MEM b) {
211  return static_cast<MEM> (static_cast<int> (a) | static_cast<int> (b));
212  }

221  COPY_TYPE_CPU_CPU,
222  COPY_TYPE_CPU_GPU,
223  COPY_TYPE_GPU_GPU,
224  COPY_TYPE_GPU_CPU
225  };

232  enum MAT_TYPE {
233  MAT_TYPE_32F_C1,
234  MAT_TYPE_32F_C2,
235  MAT_TYPE_32F_C3,
236  MAT_TYPE_32F_C4,
237  MAT_TYPE_8U_C1,
238  MAT_TYPE_8U_C2,
239  MAT_TYPE_8U_C3,

253  class SL_CORE_EXPORT Mat {
254  private:
255  // Array size.
256  Resolution size;
257 
258  // Number of values by pixels.
259  size_t channels = 0;
260 
261  // GPU Step of the Mat in Bytes.
262  size_t step_gpu = 0;
263 
264  // CPU Step of the Mat in Bytes.
265  size_t step_cpu = 0;
266 
267  // size in bytes of one pixel
268  size_t pixel_bytes = 0;
269 
270  // Data format.
271  MAT_TYPE data_type;
272 
273  // Type of allocated memory.
274  MEM mem_type = sl::MEM_CPU;
275 
276  // Pointer to memory on HOST/CPU, if available.
277  uchar1 *ptr_cpu = NULL;
278 
279  // Pointer to memory on DEVICE/GPU, if available.
280  uchar1 *ptr_gpu = NULL;
281 
282  // Defines if the Mat is initialized.
283  bool init = false;
284 
285  // Defines if the memory is owned (and thus freed) or shared.
286  bool memory_owner = false;
287 
288  //private
289  int castSLMat();
290 
291  public:
292  // Variable used in verbose mode to indicate witch Mat is printing informations.
293  sl::String name;
294 
295  // Whether the MAT can display informations or not.
296  bool verbose = false;
297 
301  Mat();
302 
311  Mat(size_t width, size_t height, MAT_TYPE mat_type, MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU);
312 
323  Mat(size_t width, size_t height, MAT_TYPE mat_type, sl::uchar1 *ptr, size_t step, MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU);
324 
336  Mat(size_t width, size_t height, MAT_TYPE mat_type, sl::uchar1 *ptr_cpu, size_t step_cpu, sl::uchar1 *ptr_gpu, size_t step_gpu);
337 
345  Mat(sl::Resolution resolution, MAT_TYPE mat_type, MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU);
346 
356  Mat(sl::Resolution resolution, MAT_TYPE mat_type, sl::uchar1 *ptr, size_t step, MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU);
357 
368  Mat(sl::Resolution resolution, MAT_TYPE mat_type, sl::uchar1 *ptr_cpu, size_t step_cpu, sl::uchar1 *ptr_gpu, size_t step_gpu);
369 
375  Mat(const sl::Mat &mat);
376 
385  void alloc(size_t width, size_t height, MAT_TYPE mat_type, MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU);
386 
394  void alloc(sl::Resolution resolution, MAT_TYPE mat_type, MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU);

399  ~Mat();
400 
405  void free(MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU | MEM_GPU);

513  inline size_t getWidth() const {
514  return size.width;
515  }
516 
521  inline size_t getHeight() const {
522  return size.height;
523  }
524 
529  inline Resolution getResolution() const {
530  return size;
531  }
532 
537  inline size_t getChannels() const {
538  return channels;
539  }
540 
545  inline MAT_TYPE getDataType() const {
546  return data_type;
547  }
548 
553  inline MEM getMemoryType() const {
554  return mem_type;
555  }
556 
562  template <typename N>
563  N *getPtr(MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU) const;
564 
570  inline size_t getStepBytes(MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU) const {
571  switch (memory_type) {
572  case MEM_CPU:
573  return step_cpu;
574  case MEM_GPU:
575  return step_gpu;
576  }
577  return 0;
578  }
579 
585  template <typename N>
586  inline size_t getStep(MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU) const {
587  return getStepBytes(memory_type) / sizeof(N);
588  }
589 
595  inline size_t getStep(MEM memory_type = MEM_CPU)const {
596  switch (data_type) {
597  case sl::MAT_TYPE_32F_C1:
598  return getStep<sl::float1>(memory_type);
599  case sl::MAT_TYPE_32F_C2:
600  return getStep<sl::float2>(memory_type);
601  case sl::MAT_TYPE_32F_C3:
602  return getStep<sl::float3>(memory_type);
603  case sl::MAT_TYPE_32F_C4:
604  return getStep<sl::float4>(memory_type);
605  case sl::MAT_TYPE_8U_C1:
606  return getStep<sl::uchar1>(memory_type);
607  case sl::MAT_TYPE_8U_C2:
608  return getStep<sl::uchar2>(memory_type);
609  case sl::MAT_TYPE_8U_C3:
610  return getStep<sl::uchar3>(memory_type);
611  case sl::MAT_TYPE_8U_C4:
612  return getStep<sl::uchar4>(memory_type);
613  }
614  return 0;
615  }
616 
621  inline size_t getPixelBytes() const {
622  return pixel_bytes;
623  }
624 
629  inline size_t getWidthBytes() const {
630  return pixel_bytes * size.width;
631  }
632 
637  sl::String getInfos();
638 
643  inline bool isInit() const {
644  return init;
645  }
646 
652  inline bool isMemoryOwner() const {
653  return memory_owner;
654  }
655 
661  ERROR_CODE clone(const Mat &src);
662 
669  ERROR_CODE move(Mat &dst);
670 
677  static void swap(sl::Mat &mat1, sl::Mat &mat2);
678  };
